text: Long Wei (; born 22 January 1995 in Wuhan) is a Chinese professional football player who currently plays for China League One side Zhejiang Greentown. ==Club career== In 2014, Long Wei started his professional footballer career with Wuhan Zall in the China League One.2014赛季中甲联赛武汉卓尔队球员完全名单 at sports.sohu.com 2014-03-14. Retrieved 2016-09-08 On 14 July 2016, Long signed for Chinese Super League side Henan Jianye.武汉小将龙威加盟建业 at sports.163.com 2016-07-14 Retrieved 2016-09-08 On 16 July 2016, Long made his debut for Henan in the 2016 Chinese Super League against Chongqing Lifan.费尔南多破门吉利奥蒂建功 建业0-3力帆 at sports.sohu.com 2016-07-16. Retrieved 2016-09-08 == Club career statistics == Statistics accurate as of match played 31 December 2019.龙威 at sodasoccer.com.
